{{Wireless embedded system |brand=National Datacomm |model=NWH8010 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Samsung |cpu1_model=S3C4510B |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=1 MiB |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=8 MiB |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=ISL3685 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} '''InstantWave''' ''11Mbps Wireless Secure Router''
[http://web2010.nbl.org.tw/services/files/seminar815/slides/WLAN_FinalResults.pdf Tested in ~ 2002 by the '''National Benchmarking Lab''' in Japan] :Notes the router as using S3C4510B, 1 MB Flash + 8 MB RAM, PRISM 2.5 radio, and Linux for the OS [http://www.shimizu.com.hk/wlansol.htm Product info] and [http://www.shimizu.com.hk/Support/Wlan/NWH8010.htm firmware] on ''shimizu.com.hk'' *Power: 5VDC input, 10 watts max. power consumption *Dimensions: [[Dimensions::258 mm x 168 mm x 45 mm]]
